casebody.data:
EDISON FIXTURE COMPANY, INCORPORATED, PLAINTIFF-APPELLANT, v. A. M. HOWARD, DEFENDANT-APPELLEE. Argued October 8, 1924 Decided February 5, 1925.

Before Justices Trenchard, Minturu and Lloyd.

For the appellant, Herman B. J. Wecksiein. For the appellee. Thomas P. Gurley. Pee Curiam.

This case was argued with, and is controlled by, our decision in Edison Fixture Co., Inc., v. Copoulos, No. 475, of the present term.

The judgment will be reversed and a venire de novo awarded.
